Title: Halter Top Beaded Evening Dress

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: CR730-perry-blue-halter-top-beaded-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A flirtatious gown perfect for a high school dance. The razor back and halter top are embellished with colorful beads that create a swirling look. The back is open shoulders and an open lower back. The skirt of the  gown is pleated and falls to the floor.
